MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH17 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Lasswade Bank and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:08PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:51 PM on Sunday, 10 January 2021
